title: Which best example of mere exposure effect

content.question: Which of the following scenarios is the best example of the mere-exposure effect?

choices.label: After tasting a soft drink for the first time, Frank immediately decides it is his favorite drink.
A year after beginning her exercise program, Georgina wants to expand her regimen.
Hal begins to like a certain sports car after seeing it frequently on the road, even though he did not like the car at first.
Kristy initially thinks her new neighbor is attractive, but once she becomes better acquainted with him, she finds him less appealing.

content.answer: Hal begins to like a certain sports car after seeing it frequently on the road, even though he did not like the car at first.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
